Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Bombinin H-BO1 (Gly-rich; Leu-rich; natural AMPs; toad, amphibians, animals; XXA, UCSS1a)
Sequence Information.Source: skin secretion, Oriental fire-bellied toad,Bombina orientalis, China, Asia

Literature Information.Literature: APD analysis reveals that the sequence of this peptide shows 80% similarity toBombinin H2.  Molecular formula:  C76H136N18O18; Mol Wt 1590.027.    GRAVY= 1.80; Wimley-White whole-residue hydrophobicity of the peptide:  -1.62 kcal/mol.Activity:  Weakly active against C. albicans (MIC 160 uM). It also inhibited human hepatoma cell lines (Hep G2, SK-HEP-1 and Huh7) with IC50 values of 3.61, 8.08, and 8.42 uM,respectively. Updated 5/2020
Literature Information.Author: Peng X, Zhou C, Hou X, Liu Y, Wang Z, Peng X, Zhang Z, Wang R, Kong D.2017
Literature Information.Title: Molecular characterization and bioactivity evaluation of two novel bombinin peptides from the skin secretion of Oriental fire-bellied toad, Bombina orientalis
